translation.en: I've flown with the Great Condor!
- I can't believe it! - He's gonna ruin everything!
- I have a feather from the Great Condor! - Stop it! You're frightening them!
translation.es: Una pluma del Gran Cóndor. ¡Para! Los estás asustando.

translation.en: You can be such a pain.
- Go play somewhere else. - I've flown with the Great Condor!
translation.es: ¡Ve a jugar a otro lado! ¡Volé con el Gran Cóndor!

translation.en: Only the mountain wind may enter my house without being invited.
translation.es: Solo el viento de la montaña puede entrar sin invitación.

translation.en: But, Shaman... I flew with the Great Condor! Look!
translation.es: Pero Chamán, volé con el Gran Cóndor. ¡Mira!

translation.en: You flew with the Great Condor?
- Yes. - And he gave you a feather?
Am I a shaman now, Shaman?
Do you believe a feather is enough to make a shaman out of you?
translation.es: ¿Crees que una pluma es suficiente para hacerte Chamán?

translation.en: Your time would be better spent thinking
about what you plan to offer to Pachamama tomorrow.
translation.es: qué le ofrecerás a Pachamama mañana.

translation.en: You know your offering must be your most precious treasure.
translation.es: Tu ofrenda debe ser tu tesoro más grande.

translation.en: Now, this is a very good question.
Let us see if Naïra here can answer it for us,
since she will soon become a Great One.
translation.es: ya que pronto se convertirá en Grandiosa.
Las papas crecen en nuestros campos,
como la quinoa y el maíz.

translation.en: First they appear as little, tiny seeds.
Pachamama buries them in her belly.
translation.es: Pachamama las entierra en su panza.

translation.en: She nourishes and protects them until the harvest season.
translation.es: Las nutre y protege hasta la temporada de cosecha.

translation.en: Just like a mother does with her baby.
translation.es: Las nutre y protege hasta la temporada de cosecha. Como una mamá con su bebé.

translation.en: We are all children of Pachamama.
That is why we must love her as much as she loves us.
translation.es: Por eso debemos quererla tanto como ella nos quiere a nosotros.

translation.en: Tell us how we shall show our gratitude
translation.es: Dinos cómo demostrar nuestro agradecimiento a Pachamama

translation.en: to Pachamama for this abundant crop.
translation.es: Dinos cómo demostrar nuestro agradecimiento a Pachamama por esta cosecha abundante.

translation.en: I'll make my first offering, and so will Naïra.
translation.es: Daré mi primer ofrenda, y Naira también.

translation.en: And bang, after that, we become Great Ones, and that's it.
translation.es: Y luego, nos convertiremos en Grandiosos y ya está.

translation.en: - I'm dreaming. - You're not sleeping, but you're dreaming?
- That way, I can have any dream I want. - And what are you dreaming about?
translation.es: Así, sueño lo que quiera. Y, ¿qué sueñas?

translation.en: Mama Quilla is now high in the sky.
translation.es: Mamá Quilla está en el cielo.

translation.en: What are you gonna ask from Pachamama tomorrow?
You didn't get it, did you?

translation.es: Las ofrendas no son para pedir,

translation.en: You know everything, don't you, Miss Perfect?
The snakes are the keepers of our cave.
They can recognize who is ready to appear before our ancestors.
translation.es: Reconocen quién está listo para aparecer frente a nuestros ancestros.

translation.en: Beloved ancestors, I come to disturb your peaceful rest
translation.es: Queridos ancestros, interrumpo su descanso pacífico

translation.en: only to ask you to entrust me with the huaca.
translation.es: para pedirles que confíen en mí con la Huaca.

translation.en: Thank you, ancestors, for your kindness.
I will return it after the ceremony.
translation.es: La regresaré luego de la ceremonia.

translation.en: Thank you, Mama Quilla, for illuminating our cave.
translation.es: Gracias, Mamá Quilla, por iluminar nuestra cueva.

translation.en: Your children are all gathered here
to honor and thank you for this harvest.
translation.es: para honrarte y agradecerte por esta cosecha.

translation.en: Our ancestors shaped her and placed within her
translation.es: Nuestros ancestros la crearon y le insertaron

translation.en: we return to you all that which you have given to us.
translation.es: Te devolvemos todo lo que nos diste.

translation.en: May these offerings feed your belly.
translation.es: Que estas ofrendas alimenten tu vientre.

translation.en: Naïra and Tepulpaï have grown strong and healthy thanks to you.
translation.es: Naira y Tepulpai crecieron sanos y fuertes gracias a ti.

translation.en: The time has come for them to make their first offering
translation.es: Llegó el momento de que entreguen su primer ofrenda

translation.en: as a token of gratitude to you.
you must offer to Pachamama the most precious thing you have.
translation.es: debes ofrecerle la cosa más preciada que tengas.

translation.en: But this is all I have.
translation.es: Esto es lo único que tengo.

translation.en: I have a feeling you can do better.
It'll have to wait until the next harvest.
translation.es: Deberá esperar a la próxima cosecha.

translation.en: Tepulpaï is not a Great One yet!
translation.es: Tepulpai no es un Grandioso aún.

translation.en: She's the most precious thing I have.
translation.es: Es lo más preciado que tengo.

translation.en: Must the blood of this llama be shed?
translation.es: ¿Debemos derramar la sangre de esta llama?

translation.en: that she is shedding her own tears
- Now you are a Great One. - Lamita!
Sorry. I took you for a stone.
translation.es: Lo siento. Pensé que eras una piedra.

translation.en: We barely finished picking our crops.
translation.es: Apenas terminamos de recoger la cosecha.

translation.en: It's the Great Collector of the Great Inca.
translation.es: Es el Gran Recaudador del Gran Inca.

translation.en: May our sun god, Inti, illuminate all of you,
translation.es: Que nuestro dios del sol, Inti, los ilumine a todos

translation.en: and woe to the thief, the liar...
translation.es: Que nuestro dios del sol, Inti, los ilumine a todos y aflija al ladrón, al mentiroso
y aflija al ladrón, al mentiroso y al perezoso.

translation.en: I come to collect that which is due to his son, the Great Inca.
translation.es: Recaudaré las deudas a su hijo, el Gran Inca.

translation.en: and we had an abundant harvest.
What? You have thrown all that away?
- What a waste! - We did not throw it away.
Whatever we give to Pachamama comes back to us.
translation.es: Todo lo que le damos a Pachamama vuelve a nosotros.

translation.en: Here is the portion we have set aside for you.
translation.es: Esto es lo que guardamos para ti.

translation.en: Who are you to decide what is due to the Great Inca?
translation.es: ¿Quién eres para decidir cuánto merece el Gran Inca?

translation.en: You must give as many bags as there are knots in my quipu,
translation.es: Deben darle tantas bolsas como nudos haya en mi quipu.
Deben darle tantas bolsas como nudos haya en mi quipu. ¡Esto no alcanza!

translation.en: - No one can be worse than these Incas! - They're taking away all our crops.
translation.es: Estos Incas son los peores. Se llevan toda la cosecha.

translation.en: We'll have nothing left to eat.
We're lucky they can't take our fields away.
translation.es: Por suerte no pueden llevarse el campo.

translation.en: but you chose to dump everything down into that hole.
You wretched peasants are too generous with your Pachamama.
translation.es: Ustedes, desgraciados, son muy generosos con su Pachamama.

translation.en: They are offerings so that she might protect our village.
translation.es: Son ofrendas para que nos proteja.

translation.en: The only one who protects you is the Great Inca!
translation.es: Solo el Gran Inca los protege.

translation.en: He builds the roads and illuminates the world!
translation.es: Construye los caminos e ilumina el mundo.

translation.en: This statuette makes you all stupid. I am confiscating it.
I will offer it to the Great Inca as a sign of submission from your village.
translation.es: Se la ofreceré al Gran Inca como símbolo de sumisión de su aldea.
Odio a los Incas. ¡Ataquémoslos y aplastémoslos!

translation.en: Let's go attack them by surprise and squish them!
translation.es: ¡Ataquémoslos y aplastémoslos! La venganza no es parte del espíritu del Cóndor.

translation.en: Vengeance is not in the spirit of the Condor.
translation.es: La venganza no es parte del espíritu del Cóndor.

translation.en: But we can't just sit around and do nothing!
We have to get the huaca back!
I will see to that. As soon as Walumama no longer needs my care.
translation.es: Yo me encargaré, cuando Walumama se mejore.

translation.en: But, Shaman, if we wait too long, we'll never catch them.
They'll get to Cusco and give the huaca to the Great Inca.
translation.es: Llegarán a Cusco y le darán la Huaca al Gran Inca.

translation.en: Can't you just listen to the shaman without arguing for a change?
Listen to the shaman, will you?
You're back. So you're not mad at me, after all?
Come on. I'll show the shaman what I'm capable of.
translation.es: Le demostraré al Chamán de lo que soy capaz.

translation.en: Lucky you. You can eat whatever you find.
translation.es: Que suerte tienes, puedes comer lo que encuentres.

translation.en: Got any food or drink for me?
translation.es: ¿Me das algo de comer o beber?

translation.en: No way. I'm not carrying you. I'm tired.
translation.es: No, no te cargaré. Estoy cansado.

translation.en: I'm coming with you, and so is Lamita.
The shaman sent you to spy on me, right?
He did not. He doesn't even know I'm here.
I see. So, now Miss Perfect is disobeying the shaman.
translation.es: Ya veo. La Srta. Perfecta lo desobedece.

translation.en: Well, yes. Someone must bring the huaca back to the village.
translation.es: Sí. Alguien debe recuperar la Huaca.

translation.en: Kirkincho and I, we don't need any help.
translation.es: Kirkincho y yo no necesitamos ayuda.

translation.en: See? You're such a coward, you can't even cross the bridge.
translation.es: ¿Ves? Eres una cobarde que no puede ni cruzar el puente.

translation.en: - Go back to the village! - We're coming with you.
translation.es: Regresa a la aldea. Iremos contigo.

translation.en: - You can't stop us. - No way!
You'll slow us down. I don't need you.
We didn't walk all this way for nothing.
translation.es: No vinimos hasta aquí para irnos.

translation.en: And don't tell me you don't need this.
translation.es: Y no digas que no necesitas esto.

translation.en: for feeding us and giving us strength for this journey.
translation.es: por alimentarnos y darnos fuerzas para este viaje.

translation.en: Right. We have no time for ceremony.
translation.es: Bien. No tenemos tiempo para esto.

translation.en: The Incas aren't gonna wait for us.
and I bring the huaca back to the village.
translation.es: y regreso la Huaca a la aldea.

translation.en: Talking is not gonna help us catch up with the Incas.
translation.es: Hablar no nos ayudará a alcanzarlos.

translation.en: Make way for the chasqui of the Inca!
translation.es: Abran paso para el chasqui de los Incas.

translation.en: Look at those stars above our village.
translation.es: Mira las estrellas sobre nuestra aldea.

translation.en: They're the stars of the Great Condor.
translation.es: Son las estrellas del Gran Cóndor.

translation.en: You know, I can't stop thinking about Walumama.
translation.es: No dejo de pensar en Walumama.

translation.en: She was so ill when I left the village.
translation.es: Estaba tan enferma cuando me fui.

translation.en: I'm sure the shaman will heal her.
And what if we don't find our huaca?
One of the stars is dancing.
translation.es: Una de las estrellas está bailando.

translation.en: Let's take advantage of the night to find the Incas.
translation.es: Aprovechemos la noche para encontrar a los Incas.

translation.en: They've gone into the sea of clouds.
There's so many of them. They're stronger, and they've got weapons.
translation.es: Son demasiados. Son más fuertes y tienen armas.

translation.en: How are we gonna do this?
We'll just come from behind. Quiet and slow.
They won't see us with all these clouds.
translation.es: No nos verán entre las nubes.

translation.en: The Incas are so loud. We can't miss them.
translation.es: Son muy ruidosos. No podemos perderlos.

translation.en: We must stick to the trail.
Thank you, Lamita. We're so lucky you're here.
translation.es: Gracias, Lamita. Tenemos suerte que estés aquí.

translation.en: Walumama always says that whenever you're scared,
translation.es: Walumama siempre dice que cuando tienes miedo

translation.en: you should breathe deeply to remind yourself that you're alive.
translation.es: debes respirar para recordar que sigues vivo.

translation.en: I think I stepped on a...
Yes! I know how to find the Incas.
translation.es: ¡Sí! Sé cómo encontrar a los Incas.
seguir las cacas de sus llamas.

translation.en: I hate the Incas... and their llamas!
translation.es: Odio a los Incas y a sus llamas.

translation.en: They're going to meet with the great Inca.
- All is lost. - We're not giving up!
We're not just going to jump into the mouth of the Puma.
translation.es: No saltaremos a la boca del puma.

translation.en: I told you that it wouldn't be easy. No one forced you to come.
translation.es: Te dije que no sería fácil. Tú quisiste venir.

translation.en: May I remind you that, without us,
you would have fallen down and broken your neck in that sea of clouds.
translation.es: te hubieses quebrado el cuello en las nubes.

translation.en: You should think twice before making decisions.
translation.es: Piensa dos veces antes de decidir algo.

translation.en: We are never gonna get our huaca back just by think twicing.
translation.es: Nunca recuperaremos la Huaca si solo pensamos.

translation.en: Make way for the... chasqui of the Inca.
translation.es: Abran paso para el chasqui de los Incas.

translation.en: I've come from the shore with a message for the Great Inca.
translation.es: Vengo de la orilla con un mensaje para el Gran Inca.

translation.en: A floating house has arrived on the waters.
translation.es: Una casa flotante llegó por las aguas.

translation.en: We must deliver the message to the Great Inca.
translation.es: Debemos darle el mensaje al Gran Inca.

translation.en: Isn't that what a chasqui's supposed to do?
translation.es: ¿No es ese el trabajo de un chasqui?

translation.en: I think he's gone to meet his ancestors.
translation.es: Creo que se fue a conocer a sus ancestros.

translation.en: Those gods are really... mighty gods.
So if the Great Inca needs to hear this message, right?
translation.es: El Gran Inca necesita saber de esto, ¿no?

translation.en: And we need to get our huaca back... can't we make some kind of trade?
translation.es: Y nosotros queremos la Huaca. Podemos hacer un intercambio.

translation.en: Now, that, Naïra, that is some great think twicing.
translation.es: Eso, Naira, es una genial idea.

translation.en: He's come all that way to deliver this message.
translation.es: Vino hasta aquí a dar el mensaje.

translation.en: So now, it's up to us to finish his mission.
translation.es: Es nuestro deber terminar su misión.

translation.en: We won't let you down, brave chasqui. You'll be proud of us.
They're not real pumas. They're just Inca guards.
translation.es: No son pumas de verdad, son guardias.

translation.en: Don't show them we're afraid, or else they won't let us through.
translation.es: No muestres miedo o no podremos entrar.

translation.en: May our god Inti illuminate you, travelers,
translation.es: Que nuestro dios Inti los ilumine

translation.en: and may the thief, the liar, and the lazy man be punished.
translation.es: y que el ladrón, el mentiroso y el perezoso sean castigados.

translation.en: Fresh fish for the Great Inca!
translation.es: Peces frescos para el Gran Inca.

translation.en: They are on their way to see the Great Inca.
translation.es: Están yendo a ver al Gran Inca.

translation.en: Wow! The Temple of the Sun.
That is a very high house.
It's high enough to be closer to his father, Inti.
translation.es: Está alta para estar cerca de su padre, Inti.

translation.en: all those stairs to get up there!
Besides, they say he never touches the ground.
translation.es: Además, dicen que nunca toca el suelo.

translation.en: Make way for the chasquis of the Inca!
translation.es: Abran paso para los chasquis de los Incas.

translation.en: If you're a chasqui, then I'm a llama.
translation.es: Si tú eres un chasqui, yo soy una llama.

translation.en: He claims to be a chasqui?
Any chasqui who blows into the pututu may enter the temple,
translation.es: Cualquier chasqui que suene el pututu puede entrar al templo

translation.en: Great Inca, here is some medicine prepared by our shaman
translation.es: Gran Inca, aquí tiene medicina preparada por nuestro Chamán

translation.en: from the bark and roots of the Kuntisuyu, a plant found in our village.
translation.es: Gran Inca, aquí tiene medicina preparada por nuestro Chamán de las cortezas y raíces de nuestro Kuntisuyu.

translation.en: Interesting. Give it to the llamas of the Inca.
Great Inca, our people, the Kollasuyo,
translation.es: Gran Inca, nuestra gente, los Kollasuyo

translation.en: have crafted for you this cloak,
with the feathers of the rare luta bird from the White Mountains.
translation.es: con plumas del extraño Luta, de las montañas Blancas.

translation.en: A rare bird that gets so easily caught has no glamour.
translation.es: Un ave que es fácil de capturar no tiene glamour.

translation.en: This cloak is not a cloak,
translation.es: Un ave que es fácil de capturar no tiene glamour. No es una capa, es una alfombra.
No es una capa, es una alfombra.

translation.en: He's being carried on some sort of tray by servants.
translation.es: Sirvientes lo llevan como en una bandeja.

translation.en: Great Inca, we have walked all the way from the riverbanks
translation.es: Gran Inca, caminamos desde el río

translation.en: to bring you this basket of fresh fish.
Not in the mood for fish.
we have run nine suns nonstop and--
Accept this offering from a remote village.
translation.es: Acepta esta ofrenda de una aldea remota.

translation.en: Its people wish to express their deep gratitude
translation.es: Su gente desea expresar su gratitud

translation.en: and are now entirely devoted to Inti,
translation.es: y son ahora devotos a Inti,
- La Huaca. - Hablaré con el Gran Inca.

translation.en: - I'll have a word with this Great Inca. - No, wait. Let me handle it.
translation.es: - La Huaca. - Hablaré con el Gran Inca. Espera, yo me encargo.

translation.en: Make way for the chasquis of the Inca!
translation.es: Abran paso para los chasquis de los Incas.

translation.en: These are some very tiny chasquis.
we bring you a very big...
As big as you, no doubt.
translation.es: Tan grande como ustedes me imagino.

translation.en: Just as soon as Your Lightness agrees to repair a great injustice.
translation.es: Solo si usted, Su Luminosidad, acepta reparar una injusticia.

translation.en: How dare you address the Son of the Sun with such arrogance?
translation.es: ¿Cómo te atreves a hablarle al Hijo del Sol así?

translation.en: Your great collector here stole this huaca.
You must give it back to us.
The peasants in that village are nothing but a lazy lot.
translation.es: En esa aldea son todos unos perezosos.

translation.en: I already have a whole room filled with these trinkets,
translation.es: Ya tengo un cuarto lleno de baratijas.

translation.en: bigger and fancier than this one.
translation.es: Más grandes y lindas que esa.

translation.en: Now, return this thing to the tiny chasqui.
translation.es: Más grandes y lindas que esa. Regrésale eso a la chasquita.

translation.en: Now, let me have my message.

translation.es: Bien. Muchos dioses de metal llegaron a Mamá Cocha, la madre mar,

translation.en: Many metal gods have arrived on Mama Cocha, our mother sea.
translation.es: Muchos dioses de metal llegaron a Mamá Cocha, la madre mar,

translation.en: spitting fire... and burying everything in their path.
translation.es: Escupen fuego y queman todo en su camino.

translation.en: And they will destroy the Incas.
The Great Inca is about to fall!
Woe to the world if he touches the ground.
translation.es: Mal al mundo si él toca el suelo.

translation.en: I don't ever want to hear about those so- called metal gods again.
translation.es: No quiero escuchar más sobre esos dioses de metal.

translation.en: No one can destroy the son of Inti!
translation.es: Nadie puede destruir al hijo de Inti.

translation.en: Throw these tiny liars into the dungeon.
The pumas will shut them up!
May the Great Condor strike you
translation.es: Que el Gran Cóndor te golpee

translation.en: and throw you out of your stupid tray!
translation.es: y te tire de tu bandeja tonta.

translation.en: The chasquis were telling the truth!
You can't take that. That's my jewelry!
- They're monsters! - It's not funny. I want them to stop.
translation.es: ¡Monstruos! No es gracioso. Quiero que paren.

translation.en: No! It contains our most sacred treasure!
Don't worry, Naïra. She will find her way back to the village.
translation.es: No te preocupes, regresará a la aldea.

translation.en: Listen! That's condor feathers in there.

translation.es: Las plumas no hacen ese sonido.

translation.en: Here, run and bring the huaca back to the village.
translation.es: Toma. Corre y regresa la Huaca a la aldea.

translation.en: You know, I'm glad to have you as a friend.
translation.es: Me alegra que seas mi amigo.

translation.en: Now we've gotta get out of here and fast.
translation.es: Debemos salir de aquí. Naira y Lamita nos necesitan.

translation.en: Naïra and Lamita need us. Do you smell something?
translation.es: Naira y Lamita nos necesitan. ¿Hueles algo?

translation.en: We don't want the pumas to catch us.
translation.es: No queremos que nos atrapen los pumas.

translation.en: With you, it's always eat, eat, eat.
You're facing the power of the Great Condor!
This puma is the sun of my night.
translation.es: Este puma es el sol de mi noche.

translation.en: And what is your name, little one?
I need to get out of this place as fast as possible
translation.es: Debo salir de aquí rápido para encontrar a mi amiga.

translation.en: to go find my friend Naïra.
The men of metal are chasing her, and they want to steal--
translation.es: Los hombres de metal la persiguen y quieren...

translation.en: They are the ones who make the ground tremble.
translation.es: Son los que hacen temblar el suelo.

translation.en: I saw them in the stars a long time ago.
translation.es: Los vi hace mucho en las estrellas.

translation.en: Men of metal, with hair on their chins,
translation.es: Hombres de metal con pelo en el mentón

translation.en: And I know what they're capable of.
Oh, so you're the Great Observer.
Well, the Great Inca said you were a liar.
translation.es: El Gran Inca dijo que mientes.

translation.en: But he was wrong, it seems.
The men of metal attacked him, and they took everything from him.
translation.es: Los hombres lo atacaron y le robaron todo.

translation.en: And, you know? He touched the ground! So now, you can get out, too.
translation.es: Y además, ¡tocó el suelo! Puedes salir de aquí ahora.

translation.en: Alas, there is no way out of the labyrinth.
translation.es: No se puede salir del laberinto.

translation.en: I've been living alone here for so long.
Come, dry off in my chamber.
thank you for feeding me here in the depths of your belly.
translation.es: gracias por alimentarme en la profundidad de tu vientre.

translation.en: You know, before they threw me into this hole,
translation.es: Antes de que me tirasen aquí,

translation.en: I was the Great Observer of the Inca.
I worshiped Inti, our sun god.
translation.es: Veneraba a Inti, el dios Sol.
Privado de la luz para siempre.

translation.en: I have become the Shadow Gazer.
translation.es: Soy el Observador de las Sombras.

translation.en: Grateful for this puma to keep me company.
translation.es: Agradecido que este puma me acompañe.

translation.en: You'll get used to it in time.
I don't wanna get used to it. I want to go home with Naïra,
translation.es: No quiero eso. Quiero irme a casa con Naira, Lamita, Kirkincho y la Huaca.
con Naira, Lamita, Kirkincho y la Huaca.

translation.en: Anger breathes crazy ideas through your head, my boy.
translation.es: La ira pone ideas locas en tu cabeza.

translation.en: I hate the Incas and the men of metal. They're thieves.
translation.es: Odio a los Incas y a los hombres de metal. Son ladrones.

translation.en: - They want to steal our huaca! - And have you never taken anything
translation.es: ¡Quieren la Huaca! ¿Nunca tomaste nada sin permiso?

translation.en: Forgive me, Great Condor, for taking that feather...
translation.es: Perdóname, Gran Cóndor, por tomar tu pluma

translation.en: and for lying to the shaman.
I know how to get out!

translation.es: Observador de las Sombras, ven conmigo.

translation.en: no one can leave the realm of shadows.
translation.es: Nadie puede escapar el reino de las sombras.

translation.en: The Great Condor is the master of the wind.
translation.es: El Gran Cóndor es el amo del viento.

translation.en: Thank you for leading me out of that labyrinth.
translation.es: Gracias por guiarme por el laberinto.

translation.en: The Great Condor will fly us back to the village.
translation.es: El Gran Cóndor nos llevará a la aldea.

translation.en: No! This time, I'm not leaving Lamita!
translation.es: ¡No! No volveré a dejar a Lamita.

translation.en: It's up to you now, Kirkincho!
This is just like in my dream.
Look how beautiful Pachamama is from the sky.
translation.es: Mira qué hermosa es Pachamama desde el cielo.

translation.en: The Great Condor is losing its feathers.
translation.es: El Gran Cóndor pierde sus plumas.

translation.en: Do you think the Great Condor crashed?
I don't know, but we don't have much time. The men in metal will be here soon.
translation.es: No sé, pero no hay tiempo. Los hombres nos alcanzarán.

translation.en: Here, take the huaca and protect her.
I'll run to the village to alert the shaman and Walumama.
translation.es: Correré a alertar al Chamán y a Walumama.

translation.en: Think twicing to you, too, Naïra!
I must protect the huaca, so...
Or hide her... in the cave!
translation.es: O la puedo esconder en la cueva.

translation.en: I'm sorry for the bumpy landing.
- Did you get hurt? - I'm fine.
Run to the cave, and bring the huaca back to the ancestors.
translation.es: Corre a la cueva y regresa la Huaca a los ancestros.
Ve más rápido que el viento.

translation.en: - Isn't Tepulpaï with you? - Naïra, where's Tepulpaï?
All of you go hide behind the cacti, quick!
The men of metal are coming!
translation.es: Los hombres de metal se acercan.

translation.en: - Where's the shaman? - He left the village to find you.
- You didn't see him? - No. And Walumama?
The snakes are the keepers of our cave.
They can recognize who is ready to appear before our ancestors.
translation.es: Reconocen quién está listo para aparecer frente a los ancestros.

translation.en: - You must trust them. - You must trust them.

translation.es: No, el pozo de Pachamama no.

translation.en: You have no right to take what's inside of it!
translation.es: No tienen derecho de llevarse lo que hay dentro.

translation.en: Watch out! They will make the ground shake!
Ancestors, I have brought the huaca back to you.
I know. But the men of metal are here to attack our village.
translation.es: Lo sé, pero los hombres de metal atacan nuestra aldea.

translation.en: - Thank you, Walumama! - Thank you, Walumama!
Wow! You're not such a coward, after all! Let's go!
translation.es: ¡Vaya! No eres una cobarde al final. ¡Vamos!

translation.en: - Over here! Put it out! - Hurry, we need more!
The fire! It's burning our fields!
Look! The shaman is calling for the rain!
translation.es: ¡Mira! El Chamán llama a la lluvia.

translation.en: Oh, no! Please, Shaman, don't give up!
translation.es: No, por favor, Chamán. ¡No te rindas!

translation.en: The Inca stole all our crops.
We have nothing left to eat.
And no more seeds to sow.
What are we going to do?
Why are such calamities striking our village?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tal desgracia aflige nuestra aldea?

translation.en: I found these in the huaca.

translation.es: Semillas de quinoa, maíz y papa.

translation.en: These three seeds you stored in the huaca
translation.es: estas tres semillas que guardaste en la Huaca

translation.en: are the last seeds we have left.
May this offering feed your belly.
translation.es: Que esta ofrenda alimente tu vientre.

translation.en: Tepulpaï and Naïra, our two little saviors.
translation.es: Tepulpai y Naira, nuestros pequeños salvadores.

translation.en: Tepulpaï, you have grown so much.
I see the Great Condor in you.
translation.es: Veo al Gran Cóndor en ti.

translation.en: Now, dance for Pachamama, little Shaman.
translation.es: Ahora, baila para Pachamama, pequeño Chamán.
